welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.content: # Weeby-JS Weeby-JS is the official JavaScript API Wrapper which is powerful and allows easy interaction with the [Weeby API](https://weebyapi.xyz/) endpoints. Actively maintained by [NTM Development](https://dev.ntmcentral.xyz/) and community members, Weeby-JS receives new updates shortly after new features have been released to the API. ## Features - Super simple and easy to use - Built in documentation - Includes all methods from Weeby API - Object-Oriented - Beginner friendly - Support for TypeScript ## Installation ```bash npm install weeby-js --save ``` ## Authentication `weeby-js` requires an authorization token which can be obtained by doing one of the following methods: - Joining the [NTM Central Discord Server](https://weebyapi.xyz/discord), and then running the `/apply` command with the Weeby API bot. - Logging into the [Dashboard](https://weebyapi.xyz/dashboard) and then using the [application form](https://weebyapi.xyz/dashboard/apply) and filling in the required fields. To learn more in deep about the application process, please visit the [Getting Started](https://weebyapi.xyz/gettingstarted) page. > Upon being accepted into Weeby API. It is very important to **never** show this token to anybody. ## Example Usage ```js const WeebyAPI = require('weeby-js'); const weeby = new WeebyAPI('YOUR_TOKEN'); const image = await weeby.generators.oneImage({ type: '3000years', image: 'https://i.imgur.com/qgKvcQv.png' }); channel.send({files: [{ attachment: image }]}); // -> Image Buffer ``` ## Support If you have found an issue while using this wrapper or have any suggestions? Feel free to join the [NTM Discord Server](https://weebyapi.xyz/discord), send an [issue](https://github.com/ntm-development/weeby-js/issues/new) or [pull request](https://github.com/ntm-development/weeby-js/pulls). We'll be happy to help and take a look! ## Thanks! Thanks for checking out `weeby-js`, a NPM module development and maintained by NTM Development. To support it's development, please donate to Nate on [Buy me a coffee](https://buymeacoffee.com/ntmnathan). Also, don't forget to star the repo! ðŸ˜‹ ## âš–ï¸ License The `GNU General Public License v3.0` applies to this repository. Please see the `LICENSE` file to learn more.

setup.name: Setup
setup.content:
# Setup

1. Install Node.js v16.6 or higher by selecting the Current tab, and then "OS Name" Installer. This will also install NPM. [Click here](https://nodejs.org/en/download/current/) for the download page.
![nodejs](https://i.imgur.com/mtJcz5E.png "Step 1")

2. Install `weeby-js` with the following command:
```bash
npm install weeby-js --save
```

3. After you obtain a token from the Weeby API bot (via applying for one). Install the following NPM modules:

```bash
npm install dotenv
```

> If your platform is Windows and run into issues, then install Visual Studio C++ Build Tools 
```bash
npm i -g --add-python-to-path --vs2015 --production windows-build-tools
```

4. Create a `.env` file and add the following variable:
```
WEEBY_TOKEN=<your token>
```

5. Now, in your `index.js` file (or any other file), add the following code:

```js
const WeebyAPI = require('weeby-js');
require('dotenv').config();)

const weeby = new WeebyAPI(process.env.WEEBY_TOKEN);
```

6. You're ready to use Weeby-JS! check out the Weeby-JS examples to see how to integrate Weeby-JS functions in your project!

authentication.name: Authentication
authentication.content:
# Authentication

`weeby-js` requires an authorization token which can be obtained by doing one of the following methods:

- Joining the [NTM Central Discord Server](https://weebyapi.xyz/discord), and then running the `/apply` command with the Weeby API bot.
- Logging into the [Dashboard](https://weebyapi.xyz/dashboard) and then using the [application form](https://weebyapi.xyz/dashboard/apply) to create an application and filling in the required fields.

To learn more in deep about the application process, please visit the [Getting Started](https://weebyapi.xyz/gettingstarted) page.

> Upon being accepted into Weeby API. It is very important to **never** show this token to anybody.

construct.name: Client
construct.description: Weeby-JS - The official JavaScript wrapper for Weeby API, developed by NTM Development. Click [here](https://weebyapi.xyz/) for the website.

params.name: token
params.description: Your Weeby API Token.

methods.name: greeting
methods.description: Creates a customisable greeting image. Optional parameters can let you customise the color of each element, or let you add a message.

params.name: options
params.description: The options that contain the required parameters.

returns.description: The generated image in a buffer.

methods.description: Creates a customisable booster add/remove image. Optional queries can let you customise the color of each element.

returns.description: The generated image in a buffer.

typedefs.name: GreetingOptions
typedefs.description: Options for creating a customisable greeting image.

params.name: icon
params.description: The link to an image (.png, .jpg, .gif)

params.name: background
params.description: The link to an image (.png, .jpg, .gif) (1024x470 recommended)

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the greeted user.

params.name: greet
params.description: What should the user be greeted with?

params.name: message
params.description: Provide a message on the bottom of the user's name.

params.name: greetHex
params.description: The color of the greet text.

params.name: nameHex
params.description: The color of the name text.

params.name: circleHex
params.description: The color of the avatar border.

params.name: messageHex
params.description: The color of the message text.

params.name: font
params.description: The font to use, 'gotham' by default.

typedefs.name: BoosterOptions
typedefs.description: Options for creating a booster image.

props.name: background
props.description: The link to an image (.png, .jpg, .gif) (1024x470 recommended)

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the user who boosted the server.

props.name: title
props.description: The title of the booster card.

props.name: message
props.description: Provide a message on the bottom of title.

props.name: titleHex
props.description: The color of the title text. (Do not include the hashtag).

props.name: nameHex
props.description: The color of the name text. (Do not include the hashtag).

props.name: circleHex
props.description: The color of the avatar border. (Do not include the hashtag).

props.name: messageHex
props.description: The color of the message text. (Do not include the hashtag).

props.name: font
props.description: The font to use, 'nexa' by default.

props.name: newlevel

props.name: font
props.description: The font to use, 'nexa' by default.

typedefs.description: The Meme Response object.

props.name: url
props.description: The image URL of the post.

props.description: The URL of of the post.

props.name: date
props.description: The date the post was created.

props.name: score
props.description: The number of scores the post earned.

props.name: comments
props.description: The number of comments on the post.

props.name: awards

typedefs.description: The options object for the text formatter.

typedefs.description: All available Meme Categories:

typedefs.name: FontType
typedefs.description:
A list of all available fonts
* Gotham
* Stoneserif
* Roboto
* Arial
* Impact
* Riffic
* Minecraft
* Pinkycupid
* Paladins
* Pokemon
* Oldenglish
* Chalkduster
* Akbar
* Nexa
* Verdana
* Typewriter
* Spongebob
* Cornerofthesky

typedefs.name: TopGGVoteCheckerOptions
typedefs.description: The options for the TopGGVoteChecker.

props.name: botID
props.description: The ID of the bot you want to check.

props.name: userID
props.description: The ID of the user you want to check.

typedefs.name: TopGGVoteCheckerResponse
typedefs.description: The response from the Top.gg Vote Checker method.

props.name: dateVoted
props.description: The date the user voted (Unix Timestamp)

props.name: currentVoteExpiry
props.description: The current expiry of the vote (12 Hours - Unix Timestamp)

props.name: timesVoted
props.description: The amount of times the user has voted lifetime for the bot.

props.name: hasVoted
props.description: Whether the user has voted or not.

props.name: isWeekend
props.description: Whether the user voted on a weekend or not.

typedefs.name: TranslateOptions
typedefs.description: The options for the Translate method.

props.name: from
props.description: A valid ISO language code. Refer to this: http://www.lingoes.net/en/translator/langcode.htm

props.name: to
props.description: A valid ISO language code. Refer to this: http://www.lingoes.net/en/translator/langcode.htm

typedefs.name: TranslateResponse
typedefs.description: The response of the translate method.

props.name: from
props.description: The language the text was translated from.

props.name: to
props.description: The language the text was translated to.

typedefs.name: CurrencyConverterOptions
typedefs.description: The options for the Currency Converter.

props.name: from
props.description: A valid ISO 4217 code of the currency (i.e. USD). Refer to this: https://www.xe.com/iso4217.php

props.name: to
props.description: A valid ISO 4217 code of the currency (i.e. USD). Refer to this: https://www.xe.com/iso4217.php

props.name: amount
props.description: The amount you want to have converted.

typedefs.name: CurrencyConverterResponse
typedefs.description: The response of the currency converter method.

props.name: from
props.description: The language the text was translated from.

props.name: from.type
props.description: The currency type the amount was converted from.

props.name: to
props.description: The language the text was translated to.

props.name: to.type
props.description: The currency type the amount was converted to.

typedefs.name: WeatherOptions
typedefs.description: The options for the Weather method.

params.name: location
params.description: The location you want to get the weather for.

params.name: degreeType
params.description: The degree type you want to get the weather in.

typedefs.name: WeatherResponse
typedefs.description: The response for the Weather method.

props.name: conditionsImageURL
props.description: The URL for the current conditions image.

props.name: windSpeed
props.description: The current wind speed, in km/h.

props.name: windDisplay
props.description: The current wind display, in km/h.
